Past awardees include James Earl Jones , Robert "Bob" Alexander, August Wilson and Arena Stage co-founder Zelda Fichandler . Egypt, added the statement, recognized and appreciated the care accorded by Germany to the painted limestone bust of the famous ancient Egyptian queen, but added: Egypt is confident that the German authorities will assist in facilitating its return. The government and people of Egypt are eager that this unique treasure be returned to the possession of its rightful owners, the Egyptian people. In his U.N. presentation, Colin Powell described it as Terrorist Poison and Explosive Factory, Khurmal. Rumsfeld said Khurmal was operated by Ansar al-Islam, a Sunni militant group with ties to Abu Musab al-Zarqawi , a Jordanian extremist with ties to the al-Qaida terrorist network.
